attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: for his blatant failure to protect the citizens of England,by allowing the scum of the earth to enter this country,without any basic i.d and background checks,compromising security.This will increasingly be at the cost of more lives lost,from criminals and terrorists activities.I call on the whole inept Scottish government to go now,and allow England to be governed by the English before we become the worlds dustbin
